job.title: Senior Machine Learning Platform Engineer
job.description: The Machine Learning ML team supports productionfacing customer experiences and solutions including search engines style and template recommendations dynamic content generation phishing and fraud detection and more You will be a founding ML Platform engineer reporting to the manager of Machine Learning ML Platform builds tools from the ground up to automate dataintensive workflows enhance telemetry and reproducibility of our modeling ecosystem and provide topclass developer tools for ML engineering peers This is a handson technical leadership position where you will have support and autonomy to make architectural decisions and develop your vision of a foundational ML modeling platformbrbrAll Squarespace employees are working remotely at this time We are closely monitoring the status of COVID19 as we continue our work to build a returntowork plan that ensures a safe return to our offices and provides flexibility for our employeesbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liLead design and implementation for ML telemetry experiment tracking and feature store systemsli liTake ownership of complex production systems with a focus on microservice delivery continuous integration and automating ML workloadsli liPartner with data platform and operation teams to solve complex data ingestion pipeline and governance problems for ML systemsli liProvide technical mentorship guidance and qualityfocused code review to ML platform engineersli liLead roadmap and architectural planning efforts for the future of ML platforms and represent ML infrastructure to engineering leaders across the companyli brbrulstronguQualificationsbrustrongul li6 years of software engineering experience focusing on tools for machine learning infrastructureli liDetailed experience with productionfacing web service delivery and related engineering concerns such as containerization observability logging and continuous integrationli liExpertise in ML telemetry feature stores experiment tracking and infrastructure patterns and toolsli liExperience creating crossteam agreement on engineering solutions and architecture decisionsli li2 years of handson experience with specific MLfocused platform tools such as MLflow and MLeap cloud tools such as Dataproc and Sagemaker or vendor tools such as Weights amp Biases and Databricksli
